title: The Best-Dressed Celebrities at Coachella and Beyond: See the Most Chic Festival Looks
description: From Teyana Taylor to Emma Roberts.
excerpt: From Teyana Taylor to Emma Roberts.
text: Thank the sartorial gods, the days of flower crowns are long behind us. This year, during the kick-off weekend of music festival season, several style stars proved just how chic a concert outfit can be—even while battling record-breaking hot temperatures and windy conditions in the desert.From Coachella sightings to Revovle Festival attendees, we gathered the chicest, not-to-miss looks all in one place. If you’re in need of some summer inspo, you’ll find tons of creative ensembles to add to your warm-weather dressing moodboard. html:
Thank the sartorial gods, the days of flower crowns are long behind us. This year, during the kick-off weekend of music festival season, several style stars proved just how chic a concert outfit can be—even while battling record-breaking hot temperatures and windy conditions in the desert.

From Coachella sightings to Revovle Festival attendees, we gathered the chicest, not-to-miss looks all in one place. If you’re in need of some summer inspo, you’ll find tons of creative ensembles to add to your warm-weather dressing moodboard. From Teyana Taylor’s Miu Miu and Jean Paul Gaultier ’fit to Taylor Hill’s model-off-duty take on the Western trend, find all of the best looks from over the weekend below.

Alix Earle

Earle brought biker-chic glam to the desert with a tough moto jacket and a ruffled leather mini skirt. To bring out the pop of color, she paired the look with a Skims shirt and Paris Texas boots.

Alix Earle Outfit

LAMARQUE Dustin Moto Jacket

Skims Fits Everybody Short Sleeve T-Shirt

AKNVAS x REVOLVE Aja Bloomer Skirt

Paris Texas Nadia Boot

Lisa

Lisa, can you teach me how to look so chic in 100-degree weather? A sheer Jean Paul Gaultier dress is the only answer. Bonus points if you get your hands on the popular Rabanne bag, too.

Jean Paul Gaultier Velvet Jersey Maxi Dress

Rabanne Crochet Chain Shoulder Bag

Emma Roberts

While visiting the Redbull mirage installation at Coachella, Roberts brought a dose of chicness in a longline vest paired with a mini dress by The Park, crossbody bag, boots, and Ray-Ban sunglasses.

Helsa Linen Button Tunic

Now 30% Off

The Park Chiara Dress

Ray-Ban 50mm Wayfarer Ease Polarized Sunglasses

Bared Sitta

Teyana Taylor

Teyana Taylor brought the high-fashion trends to the desert, cutting a Jean Paul Gaultier dress into a two-piece look and topping her outfit off with Miu Miu’s coveted cowboy hat.

Jean Paul Gaultier Mesh Maxi Dress

Miu Miu Gabardine Cowboy Hat

Anine Bing Layered Heart Chain

Casa Clara Amara Belly Chain

Ariana Greenblatt

Preppy cool was the name of the game for Greenblatt. With a polo shirt paired with plaid shorts and stockings, she finished her look with librarian-chic glasses.

Mango Polo Sweater

Nia Jack Bloomer Short

Casa Clara Lake Socks

Rag & Bone Quinn Loafer

Christina Milian

Sweet polka dots paired with a frilly skirt proved to be a sartorial success for singer and co-founder of Beignet Box Christina Milian.

Et Ochs Julia Polka Dot Drape Top

Now 30% Off

Generic Chiffon Pleated Maxi Skirt

Petit Moments Riele Earrings

Bea Bongiasca Silver Maxi Vine Necklace

Taylor Hill

Hill put a model-approved twist on the Western trend, with rocker-inspired details like a studded belt and rugged boots.

Zara Embroidered Vest

Understated Leather Hold Em Belt

PTCL Bree Easy Stretch Denim Miniskirt

Gentle Souls By Kenneth Cole Emma Flat Tall Boots

Now 52% Off

Jhené Aiko

At Neon Carnival, Aiko took on the chilly desert night in a Blumarine jacket, ruffled skirt, fluffy boots, and that trending Miu Miu hat.

Blumarine Denim Bomber Jacket

Magda Butrym Gathered Tank Top

Aritzia Theo Poplin Skort

Le Specs Metagalactic Sunglasses

Alex Consani

Consani went with a classic all-American outfit comprised of a timeless plaid button-up with a lace bralette peeking from underneath. Denim shorts and tall boots rounded out her look.

Levi’s Prima Button Up Top

Now 37% Off

Agole Parker Long Shorts

Fleur Du Mal Naomi Lace Wireless Triangle Bra

Miu Miu Multi-Buckle Leather Boots
